Approach Roadway.—The cost of the approach roadway has been divided
into the classifications of work including roadway fills and grading, concrete
pavement, guard fence, and landscaping, with quantities and unit prices
estimated as listed in Table 33.







TABLE 33
DESCRIPTION ESTIMATED QUANTITIES UNIT PRICE AMOUNT

Landscaping.......................... L.S. 2,500
Total Approach Roadway.............. ... i i, $171,860



Toll Booths and Admainistration Building—The cost of toll booths and
administration building includes the cost of furnishings and toll taking
equipment to be installed ready for operation.

Total Toll Booths and Administration Building. ... .... $102,000

Main Channel Pier Fenders.—The estimated cost of the main channel
pier fenders, herein presented, is based upon the design fixed by the War
Department, approval for which is pending.

Total Main Channel Pier Fenders. .................. $62,000

Lighting System for Bridge, Approach Roadway and Toll Plaza.—The
estimate of the cost of the lighting system, presented below, includes the
necessary lighting for the entire bridge and approach roadways, toll plaza,
